select ar.id as id, ar.comment_id as commentId, ar.reply_content as replyContent, ar.target_user as targetUser, u1.user_name as targetUserName, ar.create_user as createUser, u.user_name as createUserName, ar.create_time as createTime from article_reply as ar left join user as u on ar.create_user = u.id left join user as u1 on ar.target_user = u1.id WHERE ar.status = '1' and ar.comment_id = #{commentId} order by ar.create_time desc
limit ${limit},${offset}
